entry.title: Monday: A few showers. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
